{
  "rank": 1,
  "title": "How to take a screenshot",
  "url": "https://www.take-a-screenshot.org/",
  "snippet": "How to take a screenshot on your smartphone, tablet, notebook or desktop computer",
  "source": "bing_html"
}

{
  "rank": 2,
  "title": "How to take a screenshot in Windows",
  "url": "https://www.take-a-screenshot.org/windows.html",
  "snippet": "Use either keyboard shortcuts or the Snipping Tool to take a screenshot of the whole screen or of a single window.",
  "source": "bing_html"
}

{
  "rank": 3,
  "title": "Screenshot erstellen – so geht’s",
  "url": "https://www.take-a-screenshot.org/de/",
  "snippet": "Screenshot-Anleitung für Smartphones, Tablets und Desktop-Computer",
  "source": "bing_html"
}

{
  "rank": 4,
  "title": "Screenshot erstellen mit Windows",
  "url": "https://www.take-a-screenshot.org/de/windows.html",
  "snippet": "Verwende entweder Tastenkürzel oder das „Snipping Tool“ um einen Screenshot des ganzen Bildschirms oder eines Fensters zu erstellen.",
  "source": "bing_html"
}

result.title: How to take a screenshot
result.snippet: How to take a screenshot on your smartphone, tablet, notebook or desktop computer

result.title: How to take a screenshot in Windows
result.snippet: Use either keyboard shortcuts or the Snipping Tool to take a screenshot of the whole screen or of a single window.

result.title: Screenshot erstellen – so geht’s

result.title: Screenshot erstellen mit Windows
